short_summary: Request for Regional Individual Standing Offer
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement:** 23239-230149 Polar Shelf Groceries
================================.RowStyle :faint met filters and blue runs:** not in our scope 

### Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC), Western Region, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), Polar Continental Shelf Program in the Nunavut Territories, has issued a request for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of various quantities of miscellaneous groceries on an "as and when required" basis.

### Requirement Details

* **Goods and Services:** The contractor will be required to supply, deliver and offload various quantities of groceries to remote Nunavut communities.
* **Delivery Period:** The contract period spans from November 1, 2023 to October 31, 2027.
* **Tender Status:** The tender has expired. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the CanadaBuys posting closing time.
* **Submission Deadline:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by October 27, 2023 at 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time) to be considered.

### Contact Information

* **Coordinating Procurement Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Coordinating Contact:** Rina Marsland
* **Email:** [rinamarsland@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rinasams@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** [Not Provided] 
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17465259?extsite=MjM2NTI1M19BTCgwMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17465259?extsite=MjM2NTI1M19BTCgwMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Document Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type:** Demande d'offre ouverte à commandes
